ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class Splash

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.Splash

  • public class Splash
extends Activity
    Splash activity, just shows splash screen and after a certain time or a tap on screen activity switch to SmsAlarm.
    Since:
    2.1
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm
    See Also:
    onCreate(Bundle)

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        When activity starts, this method is the entry point. The splash screen is built up within this method.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - Bundle
        See Also:
        switchActivity(), onPause(), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String)

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        Removes messages from handler when application pauses. Also calls it's superclass.
        See Also:
        removeMsgFrHandler()

      • switchActivity

        private void switchActivity()
        Method to switch activity. Called either when user tap screen or delay has passed.
        See Also:
        onCreate(Bundle), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String)
